titles.title: A bill for the relief of Silvia Leticia Barojas-Alejandre.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 4/7/2006--Introduced. Makes Silvia Leticia Barojas-Alejandre eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident of the United States under the Immigration and Nationality Act, upon payment of the required visa fees.
